property.name: description_key
property.value: This is a sleepers test quest for dev purposes

property.name: statement_key
property.value: Clear all the sleepers in the POI.

property.name: completion_key
property.value: WELL I'LL BE DANGED. YOU REALLY MANAGED TO PULL THROUGH IN A PINCH. I NEVER THOUGHT I'D SEE THIS PISTOL AGAIN. GOOD WORK, SON. HERE'S WHAT I OWE YA.

property.name: statement_key
property.value: Those cheerleader zombies need to be stopped.

property.name: response_key
property.value: I could look into the zombie cheerleaders.

property.name: completion_key
property.value: WELL I'LL BE DANGED. YOU REALLY MANAGED TO PULL THROUGH IN A PINCH. I NEVER THOUGHT I'D SEE THIS PISTOL AGAIN. GOOD WORK, SON. HERE'S WHAT I OWE YA.

property.name: completion_key
property.value: THANK YOU SURVIVOR FOR FINISHING SOME OF THOSE TASKS FOR ME. HERE IS A REWARD FOR ALL YOUR HARD WORK. CHECK BACK TOMORROW AND I WILL HAVE SOME HARDER JOBS FOR YOU THAT SHOULD BE MORE REWARDING.
